name: ABN_PLAN_INFO
description: This table contains Advanced Beneficiary Notice (ABN) treatment/therapy plan information.

columns.name: NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the note (HNO) record that contains the Advance Beneficiary Notice (ABN) information.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ABN_OTP_ID
columns.description: Stores the IDs of the linked order templates in item 2050 of the ABN record.

columns.name: ABN_OTP_COUNT
columns.description: Stores the number of patient order templates in the plan linked to the ABN in item 2050 of the ABN record.
